## map() function

Transducer. Applies mapping function `fn` to each received value and passes result downstream to next reducer.

```
[...map((x) => x * 10, [1, 2, 3])]
// [ 10, 20, 30 ]

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function map<A, B>(fn: Fn<A, B>): Transducer<A, B>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | <code>Fn&lt;A, B&gt;</code> | transformation function |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<A, B>`
